summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4181 for the improvement of the alley in block 11, Wallingford Division of Green Lake Addition, being the alley from Woodlawn Avenue to Wallingford Avenue, between North 51st Street and North 52nd Street; by paving the same, under Ordinance No. 49801, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
